scripts.http-install: claudia --profile claudia create --region eu-west-2 --api-module src/club/http --name storyclub2 --version dev  --config claudia-v2.json --timeout 60 --set-env BUCKET=preview.storymarmalade.co.uk
scripts.http-update: set BUCKET=blah&& claudia --profile claudia update --config claudia-v2.json --version prod
scripts.http-update-preview: set BUCKET=blah&& claudia --profile claudia update --config claudia-v2-preview.json --version preview
scripts.sync-install: claudia --profile claudia create --region eu-west-2 --handler lambdaDisqus.handler --name disqus-sync --version dev  --config claudia-sync.json --timeout 60 --set-env BUCKET=preview.storymarmalade.co.uk
scripts.sync-update: set BUCKET=blah&& claudia --profile claudia update --config claudia-sync.json
